results.title: Effects of hydroxymethylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitor simvastatin on smooth muscle cell proliferation in vitro and neointimal formation in vivo after vascular injury.
results.text_hl: To study the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in vivo, @<m>DISEASE_Takotsubo_Cardiomyopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054549 @@@balloon injury@@@ and stent deployment were performed in the common carotid artery of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Indolfi C, Cioppa A, Stabile E, Di Lorenzo E, Esposito G, Pisani A, Leccia A, Cavuto L, Stingone AM, Chieffo A, Capozzolo C, Chiariello M. Effects of hydroxymethylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitor simvastatin on smooth muscle cell proliferation in vitro and neointimal formation in vivo after vascular injury. J Am Coll Cardiol. 2000 Jan;35(1):214-21. PMID: 10636283
citations.BibTeX: @article{10636283, title={Effects of hydroxymethylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitor simvastatin on smooth muscle cell proliferation in vitro and neointimal formation in vivo after vascular injury.}, author={Indolfi C and Cioppa A and Stabile E and Di Lorenzo E and Esposito G and Pisani A and Leccia A and Cavuto L and Stingone AM and Chieffo A and Capozzolo C and Chiariello M}, journal={J Am Coll Cardiol}, volume={35}, number={1}, pages={214-21}}

results.title: Reduction of spinal cord ischemia/reperfusion injury with simvastatin in rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (10 mg/kg) or vehicle was administered subcutaneously once daily for 7 days before @<m>DISEASE_Takotsubo_Cardiomyopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054549 @@@aortic balloon occlusion@@@, and once at 24 hours after @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@reperfusion@@@.

citations.NLM: Saito T, Tsuchida M, Umehara S, Kohno T, Yamamoto H, Hayashi J. Reduction of spinal cord ischemia/reperfusion injury with simvastatin in rats. Anesth Analg. 2011 Sep;113(3):565-71. PMID: 21680858
citations.BibTeX: @article{21680858, title={Reduction of spinal cord ischemia/reperfusion injury with simvastatin in rats.}, author={Saito T and Tsuchida M and Umehara S and Kohno T and Yamamoto H and Hayashi J}, journal={Anesth Analg}, volume={113}, number={3}, pages={565-71}}

results.title: Aqueous extract of rhubarb stabilizes vulnerable atherosclerotic plaques due to depression of inflammation and lipid accumulation.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@Atherosclerotic lesions@@@ were induced in @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ through @<m>DISEASE_Takotsubo_Cardiomyopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054549 @@@balloon injury@@@ with a high-@CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ diet and then were divided into a control group, a rhubarb group and a @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Liu Y, Yan F, Liu Y, Zhang C, Yu H, Zhang Y, Zhao Y. Aqueous extract of rhubarb stabilizes vulnerable atherosclerotic plaques due to depression of inflammation and lipid accumulation. Phytother Res. 2008 Jul;22(7):935-42. PMID: 18384190
citations.BibTeX: @article{18384190, title={Aqueous extract of rhubarb stabilizes vulnerable atherosclerotic plaques due to depression of inflammation and lipid accumulation.}, author={Liu Y and Yan F and Liu Y and Zhang C and Yu H and Zhang Y and Zhao Y}, journal={Phytother Res}, volume={22}, number={7}, pages={935-42}}

results.title: [Effects of Tongxinluo and Simvastatin on the stabilization of vulnerable atherosclerotic plaques of aorta in aortic atherosclerosis and molecular mechanism thereof: a comparative study with rabbits].
results.text_hl: METHODS: Twenty-three New Zealand white @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ underwent @<m>DISEASE_Takotsubo_Cardiomyopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054549 @@@aortic balloon injury@@@ and fed with high-@CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ diet for 16 weeks and then randomly divided into 3 groups: Tongxinluo group (n = 6, undergoing gastric perfusion of Tongxinluo 1 gxkg(-1)xd(-1)), @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group (n = 9, undergoing gastric perfusion of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 2 mgxkg(-1)xd(-1)), and model group (n = 8, without drug administration).

citations.NLM: Li Z, Yang YJ, Qin XW, Ruan YM, Chen X, Meng L, Zhang HD. [Effects of Tongxinluo and Simvastatin on the stabilization of vulnerable atherosclerotic plaques of aorta in aortic atherosclerosis and molecular mechanism thereof: a comparative study with rabbits]. Zhonghua Yi Xue Za Zhi. 2006 Nov 28;86(44):3146-50. PMID: 17313769
citations.BibTeX: @article{17313769, title={[Effects of Tongxinluo and Simvastatin on the stabilization of vulnerable atherosclerotic plaques of aorta in aortic atherosclerosis and molecular mechanism thereof: a comparative study with rabbits].}, author={Li Z and Yang YJ and Qin XW and Ruan YM and Chen X and Meng L and Zhang HD}, journal={Zhonghua Yi Xue Za Zhi}, volume={86}, number={44}, pages={3146-50}}
